# Write model magnitude parameters into R
write.csv(ModelMagnitudeParameters, file = "ModelMagnitudeValues.csv") # magnitude data from model sims

```{r create model dataframes}
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)

# predicted values from matlab simulation

threshPredictedRTs <- c(15.9400, 3.5000, 0.1700, 0.1700)
accPredictedRTs <- c(0.6600, 0.4100, 0.3300, 0.2900)
angles <- c(0.5, 1.0, 1.5, 2.0)
AvgFirstSteeringTime <- c(0.7191397, 0.5714078, 0.4917247, 0.4854216)

data <- data.frame(threshPredictedRTs, accPredictedRTs, angles, AvgFirstSteeringTime)

data_long <- gather(data, key = "model", value = "FirstSteeringTime", threshPredictedRTs, accPredictedRTs, AvgFirstSteeringTime)

ggplot(data = data_long, aes(x = angles, y = FirstSteeringTime, color = model)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line()


```
